Description: Necklace (?) consisting of 15 beads, of various colours and shapes, and 1 pendant or spacer-bar of glass: the pendant or spacer-bar consists of three cylinders of translucent blue glass, with opaque yellow collars, joined together; 15 yellow or blue, both opaque and translucent, glass bicone, cylinder or irregularly shaped beads (many incomplete or chipped) complete the string.
